segments.text: I see the boy climbing on that stool, and it looks so unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's really stretching to reach the cookie jar, and the stool is wobbling dangerously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit surprised seeing him be so reckless, he could really hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for a cookie, like it's perfectly normal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they've done this before, or if it's their first time being so bold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely unaware, just drying dishes like nothing is happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she turns around and sees them soon before the stool tips over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kitchen is going to be a mess if this keeps up, but they seem to not care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how careless they are being, it's like they don't see the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really stretching, he could lose his balance any moment, and it's surprising how calm the girl is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the girl will try to help him if he starts to fall, or if she'll just watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene is so tense, I can't look away, it's like a little drama unfolding.
segments.speaker: PAR
